title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world Wednesday
description: People in Alberta and Quebec got a sense of how the COVID-19 epidemic might unfold in those provinces on Tuesday as health experts and officials presented a range of projections and scenarios around how the virus will spread. Here's a look at what's happening…
